name: Generation E
description:
Hello! Welcome to Generation E, an open source, free 4X game. 

Your main goal goal here is to advance through eras and be the most powerful civilization. How you do this? It doesn't matter. You can play peacefully or you can conquer the world, the choice is yours. Generation E does not  not have a particular end point of the game, you cannot absolutely win the game. You shall play until you decide if it is a win or lose, based on your own judgements. Play by your own rules!

Along the game you have to take care of the following mechanics in order to obtain an advantage:

-Expand your cities in territory and population.

-Build units to defend yourself.

-Settle some cities.

-Improve resources and gather resources.

-Build districts and other builds.

-Research new tech.

-Update your builds along the way.

System requirements (Windows):

-Dual core processor;

-4 GB Ram (recommended 8);

-Dedicated video card;

System requirements (Android):

-Android 10 or higher;

-4 GB Ram (recommended 6);

-A modern CPU and GPU;

Privacy Policy: 

https://github.com/VVWorks/Generation-E/blob/main/GenerationE:PrivacyPolicy

---A Google Play link is on the way---
